name.task.description: Type of Nano Banana image operation

name.nanobananaBot.description: Name of the Nano Banana image generator

name.aspectRatio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated image

description.resolutionProOnly.message: Resolution settings are only supported for nano-banana-pro.
description.resolutionProOnly.description: Resolution options are only effective for pro models

description.prompt.message: Prompt for generating or editing images

description.action.message: Action to generate the image. If `generate`, it will create an image based on the prompt; if `edit`, it will edit based on the prompt and uploaded image.

description.model.message: Model used for generating images. Default is nano-banana. nano-banana-pro is an alias for gemini-3-pro-image, and nano-banana is an alias for gemini-2.5-flash-image.

description.imageUrls.message: Must upload 1-5 images for the edit image task.

description.aspectRatio.message: Aspect ratio of the generated image. Supported values are `1:1`, `3:2`, `2:3`, `16:9`, `9:16`, `4:3`, `3:4`. Default is `1:1`. Only effective when `action` is `generate`; if `action` is `edit`, it will follow the aspect ratio of the first image in `image_urls`.

placeholder.prompt.message: Enter prompt, e.g., a white Siamese cat

button.uploadImageUrls.description: Upload reference images button (simplified to 'Upload', do not use 'Upload Images')

message.startTaskFailed.message: Failed to initiate task, please contact the administrator:

message.usedUp.message: Your credits are exhausted, please purchase more credits to continue using

message.uploadImageExceed.message: You can upload a maximum of 5 images

message.uploadImageError.message: Failed to upload image, please try again later

name.model.description: Label for selecting Nano Banana model

model.nanoBanana.description: Option for Nano Banana base model

model.nanoBananaPro.description: Option for Nano Banana professional model
